# transform(_:)

**Instance Method**

Applies a transformation to every element that isn’t missing.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func transform(_ transform: (WrappedElement) throws -> WrappedElement) rethrows
```

## Parameters

- **transform**: A transformation closure.

## Transforming a Column

- **transform(_:)**: Applies a transformation to every element in the column.

items.description: Applies a transformation to every element in the column.
